name: Pinball Hall of Fame
description:
Relive the days when the pinball table was king, but play like you have unlimited quarters. Vintage fun is merged with today’s technology to resurrect the greatest pinball machines spanning 60 years of pinball history! Conquer your favorite tables and discover new challenges. Pinball Hall of Fame: The Gottlieb Collection will transport you back to your favorite arcade.

Key Features

Play 11 classic Gottlieb pinball tables including:
• Genie (1979)
• El Dorado (1984)
• Black Hole (1981)
• Big Shot (1974)
• Ace High (1957)
• Play Boy (1937)
• Central Park (1966)
• Tee'd Off (1993)
• Goin' Nuts (1983)
• Victory (1987)
• Strikes N' Spares (1995)

Historical art and fun facts for every table.

Multiplayer action for up to four players.

Bonus arcade novelty games for even more old school fun.

Two player game sharing via wireless connection.

To download a .PDF copy of this manual to your PC, go to http://cravegames.com/games/Pinball/documents/PHOF_GottliebPSP_Manual.pdf
